arStrings.szText: Critical Hits with {c_important}Lightning Spear{/c} cause lightning to arc from it dealing {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} damage to its target and up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} other enemies. This damage is increased by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1" * 100|x%|]{/c} of your Critical Strike Damage Bonus.
{c_important}Lightning Spear{/c} arcs for {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} damage to its target and nearby enemies
